ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixe Strike to be fixed?  Possible 49th song???
ygData.msgSnippet: heres the thread http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/024701-2.html Lets just hope they fix it without breaking anything else that is bard
ygData.messageBody:
heres the thread
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/024701-2.html

Lets just hope they fix it without breaking anything else that is bard
related...

On a side note, last night i was in karnors and my group got disbanded cause
some left to goto to seb, was just me and a ranger left and he was goin on
that i can get a group easy but rangers is tough... and later after i
promptly get a group at the moat, i saw this a couple minutes later and was
laughin my butt off.

Joeblorangerguy says out of character "level XX ranger and Enchanter with FA
looking for group" <-- What? ranger cant get a group unless he's with an
Enchanter with an Epic quest weapon hehe, sad i tell ya

Minkin
lev 41
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: October 24, 2000 9:54 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixe Strike to be fixed? Possible 49th song???


W00T!!!!!

> Title says it all; here's Absor's post:
>
>
> We are looking into a few bardic changes. Nothing is set in stone yet on
> this, it still has to be reviewed, but I thought I'd let you know what
> we're
> thinking about. We are thinking about reducing secondary resists for
> targeted mesmerize songs (with the possibility of a new song along these
> lines). There are some other potential changes that we are considering,
> but
> I'll have to tell you about them after we have a chance to talk them over
> further.
>
> Alan
